testbed.sim
Class Sim

java.lang.Object
  testbed.sim.Sim

public class Sim
extends java.lang.Object

Title: SIM

Description: This is the main class of the simulator. It loads the parameters of a game from the data base, initializes the necessary structures and runs the game (one or several times according to the parameters). It is also responsible of managing the socket connection with the GMIs (Graphic Monitor Interfaces)

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2005

Company: The ART team

Version:
1.0
Author:
JSM && Karen F.

fulfillOpinionCreationOrders

public void fulfillOpinionCreationOrders()
STEP 3.4 Provider ---OpinionCreationOrderMsg---> Sim Provider <---Opinions--- Sim a - The Sim calls, in a separate thread, prepareOpinionCreationOrders() method of each agent. b - The Sim retrieves OpinionCreationOrderMsgs from agent outboxes and verifies message type is correct. c - The Sim generates ordered opinions and sends them to ordering agents d - The Sim deducts opinion order payments from agent accounts

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
